Summary: See them all the time but this one was really close and got a good video of it
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were barbequeing and had seen it a week before, so my brother in law said we should charge up the batteries for the vhs recorder that his mom gave my neices. the next week we tried it out without even testing it and got some good footage better than anything I have seen on tv, I have told you guy's about this years ago and this is the last time I will. It is an orb that is extremely bright, I got to a stationary position behind the trees and you can see it moving through, to me it seems like kids on a joyride and they didn't think I would be using an old vhs recorder. I have sound and it is definitly different. We see stuff all the time out fishing up in the foothills and they seem to be taking energy from the powerlines.My feelings on the subject used to be in the "wow" factor but I have gotten used to it, what are you gonna do? If yo want a copy or the original you can see it turns res and disappears. I have not converted it to digital so I cannot browse.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Orland
There were no other sightings in Orland on or around June 15th 2001
